title: Going It Alone: Why Just Writing Your Book Is Not Enough! A Personal Guide To Self-Publishing
description: Going It Why Just Writing Your Book Is Not Enough! A Personal Guide To Self-PublishingBecoming a self-published author doesn’t happen in a vacuum. It is a journey of discovery, with highs and lows, many challenges – sometimes disappointments – but also triumphs and success.Self-published international thriller author, Gabriel Farago, shares his journey to demystify self-publishing, and provides a practical guide to help you understand this complex, and often misunderstood subject.
author: Gabriel Farago
